body.p:
Hopkinsville Kentucky
March 7th 1865
His Excellency
Thos E Bramlett
Dear Sir

I have been for many years Notary Public for our County and my Commission has or is about to expire -- I would ask to be again Commissioned for the State at large as I may have as I often have had calls out of our county to certify Deeds &c for some are foolish enough to think it not Well done unless I do it
I encase one dollar which I believe is the fee

Notary Public
State at Large
D. S. Hays
apptd
10th Mch/65
